update.releaseNotes:
v3.3.1 - Changelog
New --- - Added 2 missing Checkbox settings for Event and Arcarum in the Settings page.
Changed --- - Minor changes to styling. - Moved `Enable Additional Delay Before Tap` Checkbox component to be under the Device Settings section.
Fixed --- - Finally fixed Discord integration on emulators. - Fixed many state persistance bugs when changing certain settings in both the Settings and Extra Settings pages. - Fixed `confidence` and `confidenceAll` not being converted correctly for use in image processing functions.
